name: GG [Gravity Game]
description:
Gravity Game or GG for short is a game where 1 to 4 players are fighting against each other in universe filled with planets and asteroids. Each turn player inputs angle and velocity for his projectile to be fired between the gravity influencing planets and other players ships. The goal is to stay alive and eliminate all other players.

Features:

  • Single player levels
  • Local multiplayer
  • Level editor
  • Gravity simulation
  • Unique retro feel
